meanings.definition: Feeling or expressing great happiness and triumph.
meanings.sent1: The children were jubilant after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: The crowd was jubilant when their team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The jubilant puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her jubilant laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The jubilant sun shone brightly on the happy faces.

meanings.sent1: The jubilant dancers twirled around the stage with energy.
meanings.sent2: The festival was filled with jubilant music and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The jubilant squirrel leaped from tree to tree with glee.
meanings.sent4: His jubilant spirit lifted the mood of everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The jubilant colors of the fireworks painted the night sky.
